DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized controlled trial, we aimed to compare the efficacy of video-stylet guided laryngeal mask airway real time insertion technique with the standard recommended index finger-guided insertion technique in pediatric patients.
DOC.detailed_description: Compare the efficacy and safety of using video-stylet guided laryngeal mask airway insertion with blind technique
DOC.criteria: pediatric patients undergoing general anesthesia using laryngeal mask airways recent (within 2 weeks) upper respiratory infection
